name: Fixer (DEMO)
description:
You play as Torvald, a maintenance wolf-man by day, fixer for the underworld by night. You get a call late at night from a local bartender telling you he might have a job for you...

This is my first ever game jam submission! It took about a month and a half of
work. The game jam was for MS-DOS themed games, and I decided to make a CGA point-and-click adventure in the LucasArts style.

It was done in Adventure Game Studio 3.5.0, and it should run on just about
anything.
